author: Honest Food
name: Salsa Negra
ingredients:
- 180ml cup sunflower, canola or vegetable oil
- 2 tsp lime juice
- 1 tsp smoked salt
- 1 tbsp dry roasted peanuts
- 1 tbsp coriander seeds, toasted
- 1 pasilla or guajillo chile, stemmed and seeded and torn up
- 1 ancho chile, stemmed and seeded and torn up
- 1 tbsp cumin
- 1 tsp chipotle powder
- 2 tbsp sesame seeds, toasted
- 1/2 tsp garlic powder
- 3 cloves black garlic
instructions:
- Puree all the ingredients on high in a blender until smooth.
- Store in an airtight container in the fridge indefinitely.
